universal_guidelines: Use 'Instrument Serif' for all H1-H3 headings. No exceptions.
Use 'IBM Plex Mono' for any data that represents an ID, Hash, or Financial Value.
Primary Gold (#D4AF37) is for accents only. Do not use it for large backgrounds.
All interactive elements must have a hover state that increases brightness or adds a subtle glow.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Void (#020408) or Navy (#0B0F19) for depth.
Glassmorphism should be subtle (dark glass), not frosty white.
Always use the defined Icon Container for module icons to maintain the 'Badge' aesthetic.
